issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Allow searching function signatures by name
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17746](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17746). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to get all signatures of a function name during the type inference stage of Gandiva parser.
